name: Studio Time + Collection
summary: Providing Nexicans with the premium suite of tools and services they need to Plan, Build and Grow their wildest dreams!
description:
Builders use $STUDIO Time to pay for ALL premium tools & services, featuring: bleeding-edge AI, uncensorable content storage & delivery, plus direct-access to Ava's world-class support team.

Creators may choose to publish one or more of their original NFTs and SFTs to Ava's ultra-exclusive Nexican Gallery collection.
legal: Builder's & Creator's works are their own.
creator: Ava's DAO
